amuse.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to make someone laugh or smile
amuse.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He made funny faces to amuse the children.
The question seemed to amuse him in some way.
It amused me to think back to my life in London.
amuse.translation[0].definitions[0].note: In everyday English, people usually say they think something is funny rather than say that it amuses them:
amuse.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to make time pass in an enjoyable way for someone, so that they do not get bored
amuse.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Doing jigsaws would amuse Amy for hours on end.
The kids amused themselves playing hide-and-seek.
